title: SAVE THE NEXUS!

embed.description: WILL THEY SAVE THE NEXUS?FIND OUT NOW! Welcome to The League of Shorty! Suggest what champion and what role I should play next!

body: Welcome to The League of Shorty where we give it our all to save the nexus...well we did until j4 came along.Make sure to subscribe for more :D God Bless yall thanks for watching and I love you more than Corn Flakes :P
